title1_explore: Explore and create custom ELLM versions, training, additional knowledge, and coordinate any skills.
title1_studio: The AI ​​web design feature allows users to create websites quickly and easily without programming skills. Users can drag and drop elements such as text, images, and widgets into the desired location, optimizing the design process. With AI, the system automatically optimizes the layout and color scheme, providing an intuitive experience. This not only saves time but also helps you create a professional website with an attractive interface.
title2_studio: AI-powered photo editing allows users to easily enhance and customize photos without any professional skills. With a drag-and-drop interface, users can quickly add filters, adjust brightness, contrast, and crop photos as desired. AI supports automatic recognition and processing of elements such as faces, backgrounds, and colors, providing professional editing results. This not only saves time but also creates sharp and impressive images.
